docs.text: Welcome to Django + MkDocs + Material This is a MkDocs install behind Django with password protection. It's building on the excellent walthrough by: https://www.hacksoft.io/blog/integrating-a-password-protected-mkdocs-in-django Commands mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project. mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server. mkdocs build - Build the documentation site. mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit. Project layout mkdocs.yml # The configuration file. docs/ index.md # The documentation homepage. ... # Other markdown pages, images and other files.
docs.title: Home
